duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and navigate company structures to identify decision-makers
Generate appointments through proactive outbound prospecting
Leverage outreach mechanisms to nurture leads (Call, Email, and Marketing automation tools)
Work closely with the Field Marketing team to identify various events and build engagement strategies
Manage the relationship with CXOs and top executives at various events in person, online, or through Hybrid
Demonstrate Whatfix capabilities and value proposition to prospective customers at events
Coordinate with remote team for streamlined lead management and efficient coordination

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or related field (Master's preferred)
